assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Splendid Medien AG provides services for the film and television industries in Germany and internationally. It operates in two segments, Content and Services. The Content segment acquires licensing rights to feature films, including approximately 1,700 film titles from various genres, including action, documentaries, horror/fantasy, television (TV) series, comedy, children's and family entertainment, health and fitness/wellness courses, drama, and art-house. It also engages in the production of formats for television stations; online rental and sales, comprising of video-on-demand (VoD) and electronic sell-through (EST); sales of physical audio-visual media, such as Blu-ray and DVD; video rentals; and production and development of the films and series formats for TV broadcasters and VoD subscription platforms. The Services segment provides dubbing and digital post-production services; and digitization services for online VoD and EST marketing and for Blu-ray and DVD productions. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Cologne, Germany.
